title: It Dies Today - Sirens [2006]
description:
Sirens is the second full-length studio album released by Buffalo-based metalcore band It Dies Today, released on October 17, 2006. It is the last recorded material with ex-vocalist Nick Brooks.



Source: CD

320 kbps/48 kHz

joint stereo

slow encoding speed

LAME 3.98 in dBpoweramp CD ripper

embedded 500x500 hi-res album art



Track listing

1. A Constant Reminder
2. A Port In Any Storm
3. The Bacchanal Affair
4. Sacred Heart (Sacre Coeur)
5. Sixth Of June
6. Reignite The Fires
7. Black Bile, White Lies
8. Sirens
9. Through Leaves, Over Bridges
10. On The Road (To Damnation)
11. Turn Loose The Doves



FUN FACTS!:

- "Sixth Of June" is about Aileen Wuornos. In early press and on the leaked version it is referred to as "Damsel Of Death". It was featured on the Resident Evil: Extinction soundtrack.

- "Through Leaves, Over Bridges" is about Kurt Vonnegut's "Long Walk To Forever". It imitates the story, but appears to change the ending.

- "On the Road (To Damnation)" is about the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

-"Sacred Heart (Sacre Coeur)" was featured briefly in the film Jennifer's Body.
